newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Oct 21.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Oct 21.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Saudi Arabian press on Monday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Prince Sultan's Charitable Foundation signs 15 million riyal deal to implement third phase of a 500-million medical complex project.
- Islamic Development Bank chief urges Islamic states to boost trade among them.
- Saudi Railway Organisation signs 54 million riyal contract with General Motors to supply seven locomotive engines.
- Islamic Development Bank studies new shipping route between Dakar and Jeddah.
- Contract to supply and install new gas turbines for Saudi Arabia's Tabuk power plant for 180 million riyals to be signed on Monday.
